title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4822.4 - Premises usable for bingo
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4822.4 - Premises usable for bingo

State Regulations

No premises shall be used or allowed to be used for the
conduct of bingo unless the same are either: (a) owned or occupied by the licensed
authorized organization conducting the games; or
(b) rented or provided pursuant to the
provisions of the Bingo Licensing Law and this Chapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4822.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
